parity_drop[56]={57,49,41,33,25,17,9,1,58,50,42,34,26,18,10,2,59,51,43,35,27,19,11,3,60,52,44,36,63,55,47,39,31,23,15,7,62,54,46,38,30,22,14,6,61,53,45,37,29,21,13,5,28,20,12,4};
	
compression_table[48]={14,17,11,24,1,5,3,28,15,6,21,10,23,19,12,4,26,8,16,7,27,20,13,2,41,52,31,37,47,55,30,40,51,45,33,48,44,49,39,56,34,53,46,42,50,36,29,32};

initial_permutation[64]={58,50,42,34,26,18,10,2,60,52,44,36,28,20,12,4,62,54,46,38,30,22,14,6,64,56,48,40,32,24,16,8,57,49,41,33,25,17,9,1,59,51,43,35,27,19,11,3,61,53,45,37,29,21,13,5,63,55,47,39,31,23,15,7};

final_permutation[64]={40,8,48,16,56,24,64,32,39,7,47,15,55,23,63,31,38,6,46,14,54,22,62,30,37,5,45,13,53,21,61,29,36,4,44,12,52,20,60,28,35,3,43,11,51,19,59,27,34,2,42,10,50,18,58,26,33,1,41,9,49,17,57,25};
	
expansion_pbox[48]={32,1,2,3,4,5,4,5,6,7,8,9,8,9,10,11,12,13,12,13,14,15,16,17,16,17,18,19,20,21,20,21,22,23,24,25,24,25,26,27,28,29,28,29,30,31,32,1};

straight_pbox[32]={16,7,20,21,29,12,28,17,1,15,23,26,5,18,31,10,2,8,24,14,32,27,3,9,19,13,30,6,22,11,4,25};
		
sbox[8][16][4]={{14,0,4,15,4,15,1,12,13,7,14,8,1,4,8,2,2,14,13,4,15,2,6,9,11,13,2,1,8,1,11,7,3,10,15,5,10,6,12,11,6,12,9,3,12,11,7,14,5,9,3,10,9,5,10,0,0,3,5,6,7,8,0,13},
	{15,3,0,13,1,13,14,8,8,4,7,10,14,7,11,1,6,15,10,3,11,2,4,15,3,8,13,4,4,14,1,2,9,12,5,11,7,0,8,6,2,1,12,7,13,10,6,12,12,6,9,0,0,9,3,5,5,11,2,14,10,5,15,9},
	{10,13,13,1,0,7,6,10,9,0,4,13,14,9,9,0,6,3,8,6,3,4,15,9,15,6,3,8,5,10,0,7,1,2,11,4,13,8,1,15,12,5,2,14,7,14,12,3,11,12,5,11,4,11,10,5,2,15,14,2,8,1,7,12},
